\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
\bullet \& \bullet \& \bullet \& {\bullet[1]} \\
\bullet \& \bullet \& \bullet \& {\bullet[1]} \\
\& \bullet \& \bullet \& {\bullet[1]} \\
\& {\bullet[1]} \& {\bullet[1]}
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=1-1, to=1-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, equals, from=1-1, to=2-1]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=1-2, to=1-3]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=1-2, to=2-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=1-3, to=1-4]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=1-3, to=2-3]
\arrow["b"{description}, draw=none, from=1-3, to=2-4]
\arrow[equals, from=1-4, to=2-4]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=2-1, to=2-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=2-2, to=2-3]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=2-2, to=3-2]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=2-3, to=2-4]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=2-3, to=3-3]
\arrow["c"{description}, draw=none, from=2-3, to=3-4]
\arrow[dotted, from=2-4, to=3-4]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, equals, from=3-2, to=3-3]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, from=3-2, to=4-2]
\arrow["a"{description}, draw=none, from=3-2, to=4-3]
\arrow[dotted, from=3-3, to=3-4]
\arrow[color={rgb,255:red,51;green,68;blue,255}, dashed, from=3-3, to=4-3]
\arrow[dotted, from=4-2, to=4-3]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
